title: Media-integrated microlearning for understanding organizational behavior principles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational workflows and basic management concepts
context.additional_context: A course linking organizational behavior theory to practical cases using short video content accessible via smartphones. Strengthens learning transfer effects through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain organizational conflict management principles by analyzing popular drama/comedy clips with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can suggest application strategies for at least three leadership types based on media case studies.
Learners can evaluate four core concepts of motivation theory with 90% accuracy through interactive quizzes provided on mobile platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
